title: Marriage Expectations
text:
Abstract
Using Monitoring the Future (MTF) Public-Use Cross-Sectional Datasets (1976-2022), this visualization presents U.S. twelfth graders marriage expectations by gender, racial group, and mothers’ education. It shows…

Keywords
marriage, attitudes, adolescents, visualization

[motivation paragraph]
We used data from the 1976 through 2022 waves of Monitoring the Future (MTF) Public-Use Cross-Sectional Datasets, an annual survey nationally representative of American 12th-grade students [(miech2022MonitoringFutureContinuing?)].
Additional details are available in the online supplement and data access and replication code are available at: https://github.com/jrpepin/MTF_Marriage.

title: Supplementary Material
text: Full replication code for data access, variable construction, cell sizes and distribution, chi-squared tests, and data visualization creation is available in a Github repository: https://github.com/jrpepin/MTF_Marriage.
